channel.title: admin on Huijie's Home Page
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Huijie's Home Page

item.description: I’m currently a software engineer at Google research where we study user behaviors using machine learning with rich data and computing power. Previously I’m a data/applied scientist at Microsoft. I obtained my Ph.D in Statistics at Cornell University supervised by Prof. Yang Ning. My interests span widely on statistics and machine learning. Broadly, I have experience in high-dimensional statistical estimation and inference, classic and deep machine learning models, graphical models, adversarial robustness in computer vision, natural language processing, contextual bandits and offline reinforcement learning.
